pr_title: Issue #1652: VMMonitor shall handle pool nodes

timeline.message: Issue #1652: Pool entity added to common module
Issue #1652: Pool id check added for nodes with non-numeric run id
Issue #1652: Added tests for monitor pool id check
Issue #1652: pool_id label moved to properties

timeline.bodyText: Pool label exists only on kubernetes nodes, so we shall check it in checkLabels method, which operates kubernetes Node instead of AWS VirtualMachine
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.message: Issue #1652: Removed poolId check from checkVmState

timeline.bodyText: As I mentioned previously VirtualMachine  doesn't have pool label, we need to check  NodeInstance  tags instead.
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.message: Issue #1652: Moved poolId label check to NodeInstance
